description.en: The course consists of seminars where students are familiarized with main fields of philosophy by means of various active learning methods.
description.et: Õppeaine koosneb seminaridest, kus tutvutakse filosoofia erinevate valdkondadega aktiivõppemeetodite kaudu.

objectives.en: The aim of this BA level first semester course is to introduce the student to the study of philosophy: to develop key skills and competencies for studying philosophy, to direct students to reflect upon their studies and their learning process.
objectives.et: Selle bakalaureuseastme 1. semestril toimuva aine eesmärgiks on juhatada sisse filosoofiaõpingutesse: arendada filosoofiaõpingute jaoks tarvilikke oskusi ja pädevusi ning suunata üliõpilast oma õpinguid mõtestama ja õppimisprotsessi üle reflekteerima.

learning_outcomes.en: On successful completion of the course a student:
Knows what it means to study philosophy
Is able to find relevant philosophical literature
Has enhanced the skill of reading philosophical texts
learning_outcomes.et: On arendanud filosoofiliste tekstide lugemise oskust

learning_outcomes.en: Has enhanced the skill of philosophical discussion
Has enhanced the skill of philosophical writing
learning_outcomes.et: On arendanud filosoofilise essee kirjutamise oskust

learning_outcomes.en: Knows how to correctly format philosophy papers
Has reflected upon one's studies in general
learning_outcomes.et: On tegelenud oma õpingute laiema mõtestamisega

learning_outcomes.en: Is able to reflect upon one's learning process

independent_work.et: Täpsemad juhtnöörid iseseisvateks töödeks antakse kursuse jooksul.
